content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for coming to see my apartment. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask how much you are willing to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Juan. I am sorry, but I am looking for a higher rental price. I am a landlord and I want to maximize my gains. I am sure there are other apartments in Munich that may be more suitable for your needs and budget. Would you be open to discussing a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. I am willing to negotiate. What is your minimum rental price?

I am open to discussing a higher rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Juan. My minimum rental price for this apartment is 600 Euros per month. I believe that this is a fair price based on the location and size of the apartment. However, I am open to discussing a higher rental price if you are willing to pay more. What is your maximum rental price that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine
